Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player.personalBoard

Class PersonalBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player.personalBoard.PersonalBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Effector
public class PersonalBoard extends Object implements Effector
This class implements the player's personal board.

  • Constructor Details

    • PersonalBoard

      public PersonalBoard​(ArrayList<Cell> path, int startingPos, Production basicProduction, Player player)
      This constructor implements the MultiFaithPath.
      Parameters:
      path - is the Cell-made path useful for the faithPath initialization
      startingPos - indicates the starting point of the player on the path
      basicProduction - is the basic Production

    • PersonalBoard

      public PersonalBoard​(ArrayList<Cell> path, Production basicProduction, Player player) throws FaithPathCreationException

      Parameters:
      path - is the Cell-made path useful for the faithPath initialization
      basicProduction - is the basic Production
      Throws:
      FaithPathCreationException

  • Method Details

    • addActiveLeader

      public boolean addActiveLeader​(LeaderCard newLeader, boolean hasProduction)
      This method inserts the new leader into the activeLeaders list and, if it's a Production one, also in the activeProductionLeaders list.
      Specified by:
      addActiveLeader in interface Effector
      Parameters:
      newLeader - is the new leader
      hasProduction - is a boolean identifying if it is a Production one or not
      Returns:
      true

    • warehouseEvolution

      public boolean warehouseEvolution​(PhysicalResource extraShelf)
      This method evolves the warehouse onto a new ExtraShelf version. The new shelf define procedure is made by the ExtraShelfWarehouse constructor.
      Specified by:
      warehouseEvolution in interface Effector
      Parameters:
      extraShelf - is the resource that has all the information about the new shelf (quantity and type)
      Returns:
      true

    • addNewConversion

      public boolean addNewConversion​(PhysicalResource conversion)
      This method inserts a new white-marble conversion in the whiteMarbleConversions list.
      Specified by:
      addNewConversion in interface Effector
      Parameters:
      conversion - is the new conversion to insert
      Returns:
      the operation on-finish flag
